ygData.subject: Re: Reasearch
ygData.msgSnippet: ... One of each but you may be using wrong items ...(Certain  necro/mage words are out there) Mages use the Stack able version -- Jamie Macdonald A.K.A Magis
ygData.messageBody:
mikeman@... wrote:

> From: mikeman@...
>
> Help please!
>
> Can anyone tell me how to correctly research?
> Every time I try it I get the message "the quantities
> and componenets are not in the correct amount to
> produce anything" or something to that affect.
> Is this the standard fail message or am i doing
> something wrong? I'm a magician and have the elmental
> grimore which has 4 slots, should i put something
> in all four slots or do we just use 2(one word and
> one component). Can anyone answer that for me?
>
> Does anyone have a good site to go to that explains
> reasearch? I sure cant find one.
>
> Thanks
>

One of each but you may be using wrong items ...(Certain necro/mage words are out there) Mages use the Stack able version



--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
Erollisi Marr

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"

"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
-----------------------------------------------------------
